parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.92</value></part><part><name>Game Version </name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>  </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments </name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>  </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects </name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Math - Vectors </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value>  </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Execution ("server" or empty)</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Interpolates vector between the given "vectorFrom" and "vectorTo" value according to the given range value</value></part><part><name>Description</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[vectorLinearConversion]] [rangeFrom, rangeTo, rangeValue, vectorFrom, vectorTo, clip] </value></part><part><name>Syntax</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>[rangeFrom, rangeTo, rangeValue, vectorFrom, vectorTo, clip]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value>rangeFrom: [[Number]] - start "from" range

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value>rangeTo: [[Number]] - end "to" range

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value>rangeValue: [[Number]] - variable range value

</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value>vectorFrom: [[Array]] - start "from" vector

</value></part><part><name>p6</name>=<value>vectorTo: [[Array]] - end "to" vector

</value></part><part><name>p7</name>=<value>clip (Optional): [[Boolean]] - if [[true]], range value will be clipped to stay within "from" - "to" range. Default: [[false]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - interpolated vector </value></part><part><name>Return Value</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[vectorLinearConversion]] [0,1,0.5,[0,0,0],[25,50,100],[[false]]]; // [12.5,25,50]</code> </value></part><part><name>Example 1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[vectorLinearConversion]] [0,1,100,[0,0,0],[25,50,100],[[true]]]; // [25,50,100]</code> </value></part><part><name>Example 2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>[[vectorLinearConversion]] [0,1,100,[0,0,0],[25,50,100],[[false]]]; // [2500,5000,10000]</code> </value></part><part><name>Example 3</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[linearConversion]], [[bezierInterpolation]], [[matrixMultiply]], [[matrixTranspose]] </value></part><part><name>See Also</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
